casebody.data:
Johnnie WILKES, Employee
v.
CITY OF GREENVILLE, Employer, Self-Insured. (PMA Management Group, Third-Party Administrator). No. 368PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Anita B. Hunt, Durham, for Wilkes, Johnnie. Matthew P. Blake, Cary, for City of Greenville, et al. J. William Crone, IV, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. J. Timothy Wilson, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Bruce A. Hamilton, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Tracey L. Jones, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Christine Teresa Scheef, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al. Angela Farag Craddock, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th of November 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of November 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
